name: Field Surgeon
description: Field Surgeons are the first to act in the event of a combat disaster. Quick to rescue, triage, and rehabilitate, these selfless Field Surgeons are your one-stop shop for quick remedies to get you back into the action. Disclaimer, use as directed and be sure to follow up with a real physician. Satisfaction is not guaranteed and once payment has been processed there are no refunds.
lore: Your onsite go-to for quick and easy clinical care!
